projects.title: Minesweeper
projects.description: A modern reimagining of the classic Minesweeper game built with React and TypeScript. Features include customizable difficulty levels, smooth animations, and a clean, intuitive interface.

projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.description: An intelligent Sudoku puzzle generator and solver with multiple difficulty levels. Built using vanilla JavaScript with a focus on clean, efficient algorithms.

projects.title: Notes App
projects.description: A Google Keep-inspired notes application built as part of John Crickett's coding challenges. Features include note creation, editing, and organization with a clean, modern interface.
